page.title: 01WHIMPLE ********************
page.content: {Whimple}is a small village situated in between Exeter and Honiton.It is just off the old Roman road which is now called the A30.Whimple is surrounded by farms and cider orchards.It has.............. two main grocery shops, a butchers and an art shop.It has four main businesses,{Whiteways, Webbers, {Hansfords}and a{coal merchant.}There is one{post office}which is owned by Mrs.Williams.The{church}is called St Mary's.There are two pubs one on each side of the railway bridge.They are called the{Thirsty Farmer}and the {Fountain Inn.}There is a Victory Hall which is used for jumble sales,fetes, the playgroup,voting on poling day and the youth club + bingo.There are two sports clubs one tennis and one cricket club.There is one closed {puppet Theatre}owned by Ann Hogarth.
